channel.title: Facing an npc problem
channel.description:
well..whenever i hit a monster on my server and it dies then re-spawns how come i always face it and walk backwards whenever i want to go somewhere away from the npc? :confused:
wat shuld i delete out of the Facing Npc code to make it so i dont face it even though im not attkin it?
thnx for the replies and answers

item.title: Facing an npc problem
item.dc:creator: @diablob diablob
item.description:
@diablob wrote:

that problem happens most of the time, same as in general store on one of my mates server when u look in shop and click exit ur still facing him and turning like wat own3d n00b said just click away.

Read full topic

item.title: Facing an npc problem
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_n00b Ooo Java
item.description:
@0wn3d_n00b wrote:

are you using perfect ring? also you just need to click away like on trickyscape i used my crystal bow on a noob and when he tried to come back i was facing him so just click away

Read full topic
